none.name: Core Rules Only
none.description: Standard 10th Edition Crusade rules with no supplement.

tyrannic_war.name: Tyrannic War
tyrannic_war.description: The Fourth Tyrannic War. Form alliances, fight across three campaign phases, and unlock Monster Hunter and Striding Behemoth upgrade trees as your forces battle the Tyranid menace.

resources.name: Tyrannic War Veteran Tally
resources.description: Track enemy kills to unlock upgrade tree abilities. Earn tally marks for destroying enemy units; bonus marks for slaying Striding Behemoths.

resources.name: Campaign Points
resources.description: Points earned by your alliance during each campaign phase.

allianceTypes.name: Defenders
allianceTypes.description: Fight to protect Imperial worlds from the Tyranid menace.

allianceTypes.name: Invaders
allianceTypes.description: Tyranid swarms and Chaos forces exploiting the conflict.

allianceTypes.name: Raiders
allianceTypes.description: Opportunistic xenos and renegades raiding amidst the war.

upgradeTrees.name: Monster Hunters
upgradeTrees.description: Upgrade INFANTRY or MOUNTED units. Gain Tyrannic War Veteran keyword and the Giantslayers ability (reroll 1s to hit/wound vs VEHICLE and MONSTER). At 10 tally marks, select a new upgrade from the tree.

upgradeTrees.name: Striding Behemoths
upgradeTrees.description: Upgrade MONSTER or WALKER units. Gain Tyrannic War Veteran keyword and access to the Striding Behemoth upgrade tree. Destructive Impulse earns extra tally marks per kill.

pariah_nexus.name: Pariah Nexus
pariah_nexus.description: The Nephilim War. Harvest Blackstone Fragments, form alliances of Seekers, Protectors, or Interlopers, and battle across three campaign phases using Strategic Footings.

resources.name: Blackstone Fragments
resources.description: Noctilith shards harvested from the Pariah Nexus. Spend to purchase Crusade Blessings, Warlord XP, or unique relics.

resources.name: Campaign Points
resources.description: Points earned by your alliance during each campaign phase. The alliance with the most at the end of each phase earns Strategic Points.

allianceTypes.name: Seekers
allianceTypes.description: Those who seek to harvest the blackstone and end the Stilling. Imperial forces are best suited.

allianceTypes.name: Protectors
allianceTypes.description: Those who wish to protect the blackstone from others. Necrons and those with their own goals for noctilith.

allianceTypes.name: Interlopers
allianceTypes.description: Chaos warlords, Aeldari raiders, Ork marauders, and others drawn to the Pariah Nexus.

strategicFootings.name: Defensive
strategicFootings.description: Dig in and hold your ground.

crusadeBlessings.name: Single-Minded Seeker
crusadeBlessings.description: After each game where the bearer is your Warlord, roll a D6 (add +2 if you won). On a 6+, gain 3 Blackstone Fragments.

crusadeBlessings.name: Neuro-Emitter
crusadeBlessings.description: Once per battle, in your opponent's Shooting phase or at the start of the Fight phase, select up to three friendly units. Until end of phase, those units have Feel No Pain 5+ against Psychic Attacks.

crusadeBlessings.name: Acquisitive Opportunist
crusadeBlessings.description: Warlord gains ability based on Strategic Footing: Aggressive = Scouts 6", Balanced = Lone Operative, Defensive = Stealth.

crusadeBlessings.name: Empathic Disinclinator
crusadeBlessings.description: Before battle, select one objective marker. Friendly units within range of that marker have a 5+ invulnerable save.

crusadeBlessings.name: Empyrically Polarised Blackstone
crusadeBlessings.description: During the Select Strategic Footing step, after selections are revealed, you may change your Strategic Footing. Once per campaign phase.

nachmund.name: Nachmund Gauntlet
nachmund.description: The Sangua Terran War. Battle for control of Strategic Sites across the Nachmund Gauntlet using Tactical Reserves and Surgical Deep Strikes. Form alliances of Guardians, Despoilers, or Marauders.

resources.name: Battle Points
resources.description: Earned from battle outcomes. The alliance with the most Battle Points each phase collects rewards first.

resources.name: Strategic Asset Points
resources.description: Allocated to capture and upgrade Strategic Sites. The alliance with the most SAP collects Strategic Goals rewards first.

resources.name: Campaign Victory Points
resources.description: Earned across all phases. The alliance with the most CVP at the end of Phase 3 wins.

allianceTypes.name: Guardians
allianceTypes.description: Protect the planet Sangua Terra from the forces of Chaos.

allianceTypes.name: Despoilers
allianceTypes.description: Conquer the Nachmund Gauntlet for Abaddon the Despoiler.

allianceTypes.name: Marauders
allianceTypes.description: Opportunistic raiders and xenos seeking plunder amidst the war.

strategicSites.name: Strategic Site
strategicSites.description: Controllable locations on the campaign map. Alliances allocate SAP to capture and upgrade sites. Control Level 3 (Secured) grants powerful alliance-wide bonuses.

armageddon.name: Armageddon
armageddon.description: The 4th War for Armageddon. A tree-based campaign system where Chaos forces pour through the Red Angel's Gate. Features Hellscapes terrain, Anomalies, and unbound daemon forces.
